Imagenomic Portraiture 3 is a powerful plugin for Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom that allows you to retouch portraits with ease. It can automatically smooth and remove imperfections from skin, hair, eyebrows, eyelashes and other facial features, while preserving the natural texture and details. Imagenomic Portraiture 3 also offers a variety of presets and custom settings to suit your preferences and workflow.

1. Go to [https://imagenomic.com/Products/Portraiture](https://imagenomic.com/Products/Portraiture) and click on the "Buy Now" button. You will be redirected to a secure checkout page where you can choose your payment method and enter your billing information.

3. Click on the download link and save the installation file on your computer. Make sure you have Adobe Photoshop or Lightroom installed on your computer before installing Imagenomic Portraiture 3.
4. Run the installation file and follow the instructions on the screen. When prompted, enter your license key and click on "Activate".
5. Restart your Adobe Photoshop or Lightroom and open an image that you want to edit. Go to Filter > Imagenomic > Portraiture 3 and start retouching your portrait with ease.

Congratulations! You have successfully downloaded and installed Imagenomic Portraiture 3 with a license key. Enjoy!

Some of the advantages of using Imagenomic Portraiture 3 are:

- It saves you time and effort by automating the process of portrait retouching. You don't have to spend hours manually selecting and adjusting every pixel on your image. Imagenomic Portraiture 3 can do it for you in seconds.
- It enhances the quality and realism of your portraits by applying natural and realistic skin smoothing and healing effects. You don't have to worry about overdoing it or losing the original texture and details of your image. Imagenomic Portraiture 3 can balance it for you.
- It allows you to customize and fine-tune your portraits according to your preferences and needs. You can adjust the intensity, range, and threshold of the skin mask, as well as the sharpness, warmth, contrast, and brightness of the image. You can also create, save, and share your own presets with Imagenomic Portraiture 3.

Imagenomic Portraiture 3 is compatible with Adobe Photoshop CC 2015.5 or later, Adobe Lightroom Classic CC 2015 or later, and Adobe Photoshop Elements 14 or later. It supports 8-bit and 16-bit RGB and LAB color modes, as well as smart filters and actions in Photoshop.
